Container.Name: adsb-adsbexchange
Container.Overview:
Feeds ADS-B data into adsbexchange.com.
Designed to work with the other CA application adsb-main.

Config.Name: BEASTHOST
Config.Description: Required. IP/Hostname of a Mode-S/BEAST provider (dump1090)

Config.Name: BEASTPORT
Config.Description: Optional. TCP port number of Mode-S/BEAST provider (dump1090)

Config.Name: LAT
Config.Description: Required. The latitude of the antenna

Config.Name: LONG
Config.Description: Required. The longitude of the antenna

Config.Name: ALT
Config.Description: Required. The altitude of the antenna above sea level. If positive (above sea level), must include either 'm' or 'ft' suffix to indicate metres or feet. If negative (below sea level), must have no suffix, and the value is interpreted in metres.

Config.Name: SITENAME
Config.Description: Required. The name of your site (A-Z, a-z, -, _)

Config.Name: UUID
Config.Description: Required. Your static UUID. Generate one.

Config.Name: PRIVATE_MLAT
Config.Description: Optional. Setting this to true will prevent feeder being shown on the ADS-B Exchange Feeder Map
